description: Jake (played by Nick Capra) has an uncomfortable and fraught relationship with his boss, Brian (played by Adam Killian). Though Nick is in love with his secret boyfriend, Daniel (Dirk Caber), he can’t deny his animalistic lust for his muscular boss. It’s apparent Brian is up to no good, and he works hard to seduce Jake into cheating on his boyfriend.
series: Secrets My Daddy Never Told Me
title: Nick Capra Cheats With Adam Killian
